title: Ticket #637: RemoteUserCpu and RemoteSysCpu lack cumulative counterparts
description: For meaningful reporting of cpu efficiency to Gratia at opportunistic sites where preemption occurs, we need to add CumulativeRemoteUserCpu and CumulativeRemoteSysCpu. These would include time spent on runs that were preempted without a checkpoint.
remarks:
2020-Jul-13 13:04:52 by blin:
This appears to be done: 

[blin@lhcb-ce ~]$ condor_history -match 1 -l | egrep Cumulative.*Cpu
CumulativeRemoteSysCpu = 168.0
CumulativeRemoteUserCpu = 74447.0

2020-Jul-21 09:09:09 by tim:
This work done in #6022
creator: danb
